description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for notification-related API endpoints, including fetching notifications, marking a notification as read, and marking all notifications as read. It utilizes middleware for authentication and validation, and interacts with external utilities for database operations and logging.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Middleware function to validate incoming request parameters and return a 400 response if validation fails.

methods.name: GET /api/notifications
methods.description: Handler for retrieving user notifications with optional filtering.

methods.name: PATCH /api/notifications/:notificationId/read
methods.description: Handler to mark a specific notification as read.

methods.name: PATCH /api/notifications/read-all
methods.description: Handler to mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user.
